trans-unit.source: The base class for all objects that have dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: La classe base per tutti gli oggetti che dispongono di proprietà di dipendenza.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe deve essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for an event of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un gestore per un evento di un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato, si identifica il metodo che gestisce l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A meno che non venga rimosso il delegato, il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Multiple delegates can be added to handle an event.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere più delegati per gestire un evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il valore di questa proprietà.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <xref:System.Delegate> type.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, un <xref:System.Delegate>tipo.</xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uno degli argomenti è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The dependencyEvent represents a non-event .
trans-unit.target: Il dependencyEvent non rappresenta un evento .

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether this instance is in design or run-time mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore che indica se questa istanza è in modalità di esecuzione o di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questa istanza è in modalità progettazione. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate da di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite utilizzate da <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Provided as an override to <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to clean up any unmanaged resources deterministically.
trans-unit.target: Fornito come override a <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> per pulire le risorse non gestite in modo deterministico.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is required only when unmanaged resources such as raw HWNDS, Win32 files handlers, and others are released.
trans-unit.target: In genere, questo è obbligatorio solo quando i gestori di file di risorse non gestite, ad esempio hwnds di tipo raw, Win32, rilascio e altre.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> associated with the specific <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'accesso per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref> associate allo specifico <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> associated with the specific <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref> associate allo specifico <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il <xref:System.Object>che corrisponde al soggetto di un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Che corrisponde al soggetto di un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method can be used to customize the way in which a specified binding is resolved.
trans-unit.target: Sottoposta a override in una classe derivata, questo metodo può essere utilizzato per personalizzare il modo in cui viene risolto l'associazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the target of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>della destinazione di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the subject of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che corrisponde al soggetto di un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: targetType is a null reference ().
trans-unit.target: targetTypeè un riferimento null ().

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the value of the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'accesso al valore di designato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is typically used in property gets to furnish the value of the named dependency value.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è in genere utilizzato nella proprietà ottiene possibilità di fornire il valore di dipendenza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the value of the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che rappresenta il valore designato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the bound object of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> and bypasses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*> override.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'accesso all'oggetto associato di una <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> e ignora il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>eseguire l'override.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è utile nell'ambito di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>eseguire l'override di implementazione.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override code invokes the GetValueBase, and then adds additional code.
trans-unit.target: In genere, il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>override codice richiama il GetValueBase e quindi aggiunge codice aggiuntivo.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For implementing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>/<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Per l'implementazione di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>esegue l'override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata>può essere usato in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>/<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> chiamate.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to get the value of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> per ottenere il valore di.

trans-unit.source: The bound object of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato di una <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This bypasses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*> override.
trans-unit.target: Ignora il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>eseguire l'override.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.GetValue*>

trans-unit.source: dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyPropertyè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs initialization on dependency properties when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'inizializzazione sulle proprietà di dipendenza quando è sottoposto a override in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine during the initialization of the activity at run time.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro durante l'inizializzazione dell'attività in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is set as a binding.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il valore di un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> è impostato come un'associazione.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding*>.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> per eseguire il test.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if set as a binding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se impostato come un'associazione. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyPropertyè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref> of this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> equals the <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref> of the parameterized <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""> </xref> di questo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> è uguale al <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""> </xref> di parametri <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This uses the `==` operator as defined for the type of private member `metaproperties`, which is <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Usa il `==` operatore, come definito per il tipo di membro privato `metaproperties`, ovvero <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> to compare with for equality.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> da confrontare per verificarne l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref uid="langword_csharp_metaproperties" name="metaproperties" href=""> </xref> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> graph.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> grafico.

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> graph.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento padre <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> grafico.

trans-unit.source: Removes an <xref:System.EventHandler> from an associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un <xref:System.EventHandler>da un oggetto associato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.</xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Provided as a convenient direct method for removing an event delegate.
trans-unit.target: Fornito come un metodo diretto per la rimozione di un delegato dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A meno che non venga rimosso il delegato, il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il valore di questa proprietà.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <xref:System.Delegate> type.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, un <xref:System.Delegate>tipo.</xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uno degli argomenti è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The dependencyEvent is not an event.
trans-unit.target: Il dependencyEvent non è un evento.

trans-unit.source: The value is a and this instance is not in .
trans-unit.target: Il value è un e questa istanza non è presente in .

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Removes a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if operation was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'operazione ha esito positivo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The argument is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: L'argomento è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> sets the value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>Imposta il valore direttamente al <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>aggiunge un gestore direttamente alle proprietà di tipo evento.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: Questi metodi sono esclusivi quando sono chiamati per la stessa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If SetBinding is called, then the values previously set using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: Se viene chiamato SetBinding, quindi i valori precedentemente impostati utilizzando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>(<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> negli eventi) vengono ignorati.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with SetBinding.
trans-unit.target: Lo stesso vale nel caso opposto: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>(<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) Reimposta l'associazione assegnata con SetBinding.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> to set to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref> per impostare su.

trans-unit.source: Either of the arguments is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uno degli argomenti è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> is not bindable.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> non è associabile.

trans-unit.source: This instance is not in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode*>.
trans-unit.target: Questa istanza non è presente in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.DesignMode*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the target <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della destinazione <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>per impostare la destinazione di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: bind is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: bindè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>, which is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore di un <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>, che è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta il valore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Il dependencyProperty è un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to the object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> sets a binding for the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>Imposta un'associazione per la proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: SetValue sets a value directly to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> (similarly, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> adds a handler directly to properties of type event).
trans-unit.target: SetValue imposta un valore direttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>(in modo analogo, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>aggiunge un gestore direttamente alle proprietà di tipo evento).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property.
trans-unit.target: Questi metodi sono esclusivi quando sono chiamati per la stessa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> is called, then the values previously set using SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> in events) are disregarded.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>viene chiamato, quindi i valori precedentemente impostati utilizzando SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> negli eventi) vengono ignorati.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The same is true the other way around: SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) resets the binding assigned with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Lo stesso vale nel caso opposto: SetValue (<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>) Reimposta l'associazione assegnata con <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetBinding%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.AddHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to be set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> da impostare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to set the value to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>su cui impostare il valore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object>, bypassing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> al specificati <xref:System.Object>ignorando il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful inside the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è utile nell'ambito di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>eseguire l'override di implementazione.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override code would do some custom logic before calling the SetValueBase method.
trans-unit.target: In genere, il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>codice override farebbe una logica personalizzata prima di chiamare il metodo SetValueBase.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: For setting a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> can be used in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>esegue l'override, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata>può essere usato in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>chiamate.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> to be set to the <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> sia impostato su <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that becomes the value of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che diventa il valore della <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: dependencyProperty is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyPropertyè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the Site component of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un riferimento al componente del sito di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Site component of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il componente del sito del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that associates custom data with this class instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>che associa dati personalizzati a questa istanza della classe.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: This property is a `metaproperty`, which means it is immutable at run time.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è un `metaproperty`, vale a dire che non è modificabile in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: `Metaproperties` do not change after a property instance is created at run time, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.
trans-unit.target: `Metaproperties`non modificare dopo aver creata un'istanza della proprietà in fase di esecuzione, pertanto la proprietà deve essere impostata su un valore letterale in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This property is not used in the default <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> declaration implementations provided by Windows Workflow Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non viene utilizzata nel valore predefinito <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>dichiarazione dalle implementazioni disponibili in Windows Workflow Foundation.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: This collection is not serialized; data that the collection contains is not persisted from design time to run time.
trans-unit.target: Questa raccolta non è serializzata; dati che contiene la raccolta non sono persistente dalla fase di progettazione a fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that acts as an extensibility hook for developers to manipulate <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> declarations for a design tool and associate custom data with individual activity declarations.
trans-unit.target: Un dizionario che agisce come un hook di estensibilità per gli sviluppatori di modificare <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> dichiarazioni per una progettazione dello strumento e associare dati personalizzati a singole dichiarazioni di attività.
